Title: Establishes a gasoline priority list for emergency response personnel in the department of homeland security and emergency services
Summary: Establishes a gasoline priority list for emergency response personnel in the department of homeland security and emergency services for use at all service stations during a natural or man-made disaster.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a gasoline priority list for emergency response personnel in the department of homeland security and emergency services
